Condition.name: Terrain Sub Type at Loc Manual
Terrain Type Name at Loc Manual
God Power Immediate Count at Position
God Power Recharge Count at Position
God Power Cast Time at Position
God Power Recharge Time at Position
Persistent Variable Is Value Current Scenario
Persistent Variable Is Value Other Scenario

Effect.name: Paint Terrain Name in Area
Effect.Command: trPaintTerrain(tempX0, tempZ0, tempX1, tempZ1, tempType, tempSubType, %Passability%);

Effect.name: Paint Terrain Name in Area Manual
Effect.Command: trPaintTerrain(tempX0, tempZ0, tempX1, tempZ1, tempType, tempSubType, %Passability%);

Effect.name: Paint Terrain Name in Circle Area
Effect.Command: trPaintTerrain(tempX + tempX0, tempZ + tempZ0, tempX + tempX0, tempZ + tempZ0, tempType, tempSubType, false);

Effect.name: Paint Terrain Name in Circle Area Manual
Effect.Command: trPaintTerrain(tempX + %x%, tempZ + %z%, tempX + %x%, tempZ + %z%, tempType, tempSubType, false);

Effect.name: Replace Terrain Name in Area
Effect.Command: if(((trGetTerrainType(tempX, tempZ) != tempFromType) || (trGetTerrainSubType(tempX, tempZ) != tempFromSubType)) == false){
trPaintTerrain(tempX, tempZ, tempX, tempZ, tempToType, tempToSubType, false);

Effect.name: Replace Terrain Name in Area Manual
Effect.Command: if(((trGetTerrainType(tempX, tempZ) != tempFromType) || (trGetTerrainSubType(tempX, tempZ) != tempFromSubType)) == false){
trPaintTerrain(tempX, tempZ, tempX, tempZ, tempToType, tempToSubType, false);

Effect.name: Replace Terrain Name in Circle Area
Effect.Command: if(((trGetTerrainType(tempLocX, tempLocZ) != tempFromType) || (trGetTerrainSubType(tempLocX, tempLocZ) != tempFromSubType)) == false){
trPaintTerrain(tempLocX, tempLocZ, tempLocX, tempLocZ, tempToType, tempToSubType, false);

Effect.name: Replace Terrain Name in Circle Area Manual
Effect.Command: if(((trGetTerrainType(tempLocX, tempLocZ) != tempFromType) || (trGetTerrainSubType(tempLocX, tempLocZ) != tempFromSubType)) == false){
trPaintTerrain(tempLocX, tempLocZ, tempLocX, tempLocZ, tempToType, tempToSubType, false);

Effect.name: Paint Terrain Elevation in Area
Effect.Command: trChangeTerrainHeight(tempX, tempZ, tempX, tempZ, trGetTerrainHeight(tempX, tempZ) + %Height%, false);

Effect.name: Paint Terrain Elevation in Area Manual
Effect.Command: trChangeTerrainHeight(tempX, tempZ, tempX, tempZ, trGetTerrainHeight(tempX, tempZ) + %Height%, false);

Effect.name: Paint Terrain Elevation in Circle Area
Effect.Command: trChangeTerrainHeight(tempLocX, tempLocZ, tempLocX, tempLocZ, trGetTerrainHeight(tempLocX, tempLocZ) + %Height%, false);

Effect.name: Paint Terrain Elevation in Circle Area Manual
Effect.Command: trChangeTerrainHeight(tempLocX, tempLocZ, tempLocX, tempLocZ, trGetTerrainHeight(tempLocX, tempLocZ) + %Height%, false);

Effect.name: Paint Water Color in Area Manual
Paint Water Color in Area Circle
Effect.Command: trPaintWaterColor(xsVectorSet(%Red%,%Green%,%Blue%),tempX + tempX0, tempZ + tempZ0, tempX + tempX0 + 1, tempZ + tempZ0 + 1);

Effect.name: Paint Water Color in Area Circle Manual
Effect.Command: trPaintWaterColor(xsVectorSet(%Red%,%Green%,%Blue%),tempX + tempX0, tempZ + tempZ0, tempX + tempX0 + 1, tempZ + tempZ0 + 1);

Effect.name: Player Set Civ and Culture By Name
Set God Power Data at Position
Set God Power Immediate Count at Position
Set God Power Recharge Count at Position
Set God Power Recharge Time at Position
Set God Power Name Immediate Count
Set God Power Name Recharge Count
Set God Power Name Recharge Time
Grant God Power No Recharge
Effect.Command: trSetGPData(%Player%, 1, tempPosition, %Count% - trGetGPData(%Player%, 1, tempPosition) + trGetGPData(%Player%, 2, tempPosition));

Effect.name: Grant God Power No Recharge at Position
Effect.Command: trSetGPData(%Player%, 1, tempPosition, %Count% - trGetGPData(%Player%, 1, tempPosition) + trGetGPData(%Player%, 2, tempPosition));

Effect.name: Unit Set Heading and Tilt Radians
Army Set Heading and Tilt Radians
Unit Set Heading and Tilt Degrees
Army Set Heading and Tilt Degrees
Camera Set Position Radians
Effect.Param: Unique text must be different if Camera Set Position is used multiple times in same trigger

Effect.name: Camera Set Position Degrees
Effect.Param: Unique text must be different if Camera Set Position is used multiple times in same trigger

Effect.name: Camera Set Position Look At Radians
Camera Set Position Look At Degrees
Unit Override Animation Path
Effect.Param: Each number represents selector choice value in anim file indexed from 0 in the format provided above for each choice.
Each number represents an indexed choice. All choices must be provided to work. Animation type and looping can be set with Override Animation.

Effect.name: Army Override Animation Path
Effect.Param: Each number represents selector choice value in anim file indexed from 0 in the format provided above for each choice.
Each number represents an indexed choice. All choices must be provided to work. Animation type and looping can be set with Override Animation.
